response.original_title: Coldplay: Music Of The Spheres World Tour - Glastonbury June 29 2024
response.overview: For the first time, the BBC is livestreaming Glastonbury performances to a global audience, with Coldplay's 2024 Pyramid Stage set available to view on bbc.com, offering fans around the world a front-row seat to headline acts like never before.
response.title: Coldplay: Music Of The Spheres World Tour - Glastonbury June 29 2024
